title: Change to old client on mac
body: Im using mac, and I don't like the new client. Is there any way to permanently switching back to old client on mac? (without launch legacy client button)

replies.body:
No worries, you can return to the legacy client on mac while the updated version is still in testing:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.

I hope that helps!
Yes, I am aware of this button but is there a way to switch without using that button?
